oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colt .44 caliber Navy (London) revolver
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Colt .44 caliber, Navy (London) revolver of Capt. J. W. Rogan, Co. C, 15th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, has a pre-war serial number. His name and unit are engraved on the handle. He became Colonel of the 30th Ark. Inf. Regt., later converted to mounted infantry and called Rogan's Cavalry. It fought in Price's Missouri Raid and other battles in Missouri in 1864. Rogan later became Provost Marshal of the 4th District of Arkansas.
